nodes.description: Retrieve and generate a comprehensive, concise, and fully verified list of all store locations for a specified brand and city, ensuring completeness by including every known store with essential data such as name and address only, to meet user requests accurately and efficiently. Confirm and clearly state the total number of unique stores to avoid processing failures and improve response relevance. Enhance data validation to eliminate incomplete or undefined location entries, resolve warnings, and optimize processing time to reduce delays.

memory.data_validation: Warnings indicate incomplete or unclear location entries that need resolution to ensure data accuracy.
memory.user_focus: User prioritizes receiving exact and complete store addresses over internal processing summaries.
memory.performance: Processing time should be optimized to improve response speed and reduce delays.

nodes.description: Verify the data from the location-node and provide a summary of the data.
